ComicInfo.Title: No Need To Speak; Uzalec; The Clique; Rhiannon: Masks; Night And Day; Cyber-Spunk

ComicInfo.Summary:
No Need To Speak: Two lesbians engage in sex.
Uzalec: A Princess stows away on a cargo zeppelin, fleeing a marriage because she fears she'll be required to have sex with her husband.
The Clique: The school Drama Club hazes a prospective new member.
Rhiannon: Masks: Vampire Rhiannon is seduced by a strange demoness.
Night And Day: An angel from above and a demon from below conduct a clandestine affair.
Cyber-Spunk: An over-achieving businessman gets hold of a video of his wife having an affair with the maid.
